item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, October 11, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Elon Musk unveils Tesla’s ‘Cybercab’ robotaxis
2. Starboard plotted a campaign against Pfizer’s chief. Then a blank email dropped in his inbox
3. The ‘80-hour circuit breaker’: Wall Street banks tackle workloads of junior staff
4. Barack Obama says Black men’s support for Trump is ‘not acceptable’
5. Reeves weighs capital gains tax increase to help plug UK’s Budget gap
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, October 11, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
